ai-patthana16.90:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.90:0.3_0: Transmigration for one who is like the formless in the formless realm.
ai-patthana16.90:1.1_0: Not inappropriately for the sake of someone, not for the sake of lives for the sake of function, and not for the sake of counterparts.
ai-patthana16.90:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the sharing of the inner impingement, or in the formless realm.
ai-patthana16.90:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
